basics.name: Akintunde Jegede
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am an Experienced Software Engineer that mostly work with Typescript, Python and Dart. I love building things for myself and everyone else. What do you think?

work.summary: Built Client Requested Features for a Collaboration Tools
highlights: I built a Zapier app with multiple endpoints that allowed clients to automate information retrieval from their profiles
I built a Google Authentication System that allowed users authenticate their login and registration process
I did extensive work on an event management system that allowed auto-matching of users based on time availability

work.summary: Built Unique Product-Specific APIs powered by Distributed and Decentralized Technologies
highlights: I built multiple blockchain-based Application Program
Interfaces that made use of decentralized data in creating applications that  needs high level of security and data immutability

work.summary: Built And Maintained features for a Cryto-Exchange Service
highlights: I had the responsibility of working on the Nodejs/MongoDb/Redis Powered Codebase, which involved working on a direct-to-cash semi-matching engine for CryptoCurrency Trading

work.summary: Building Third-Party Open Source Blockchain Tools
highlights: Made code contributions and wrote technical articles for open source projects
Built Open Source tools for Graphene-Based Blockchain Projects

work.summary: Built tons of Static Websites, Built A Social Network, Provided Tech Consultancy to Companies and Organizations
highlights: I worked on an In-Office Task Management System
I built an app that helped to calculate the most profitable NASDAQ stock to buy (Short & Medium term) using their RSI indicator and  Stochastic Index
I built a social network that had a profile, messaging and multifeatured news system
